title: How to Make a Pearl Harbor Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill a highball or collins glass with ice.
Add the melon liquor and vodka.
Fill the rest of the glass with pineapple juice.
Stir well with a bar spoon.
Garnish with a cocktail cherry and/or pineapple wedge.

text: Fill a highball or collins glass with ice.  Add the melon liquor and vodka.  Fill the rest of the glass with pineapple juice.  Stir well with a bar spoon.  Garnish with a cocktail cherry and/or pineapple wedge.
